sentences.sContent: Turn the car towards the skid if you lose control of it.
sentences.sCn: 如果汽车失去控制，就往打滑的方向转。

sentences.sContent: He slammed on the brakes and we went into a long skid (= started to skid ) .
sentences.sCn: 他猛力踩下车，我们的车子打滑了很长一段路。

synos.tran: 打滑；[车辆]刹车；滑轨，[建]滑动垫木

words.tran: 集材工；集材道横木；集材机

trans.tranCn: 打滑；[车辆] 刹车；滑轨，滑动垫木
trans.tranOther: a sudden sliding movement of a vehicle that you cannot control
